thread.title: Las Vegas Gunman Railed Against Government Before Shooting, Police Documents Show

author: Jim Carlton
title: Las Vegas Gunman Railed Against Government Before Shooting, Police Documents Show

organizations.name: las vegas gunman railed against government before shooting

text:
People who came into contact with Stephen Paddock in the weeks before he killed 58 people at a Las Vegas concert last October said he railed against the government, behaved oddly and expressed a willingness to die, according to documents released by the Las Vegas police this week.
One woman interviewed by police said she sat in the booth of a diner eating dinner a few days before the shooting and overheard a man in the next booth she subsequently recognized as Paddock. The woman said Paddock was discussing with another man...
